name: Zombie Tower Defense
description:
This was the third game i made on my career. It has nearly the same things as Racing Mayhem but it was built from the ground-up.

CONTROLS:

Use your mouse to aim, LMB (Left Mouse Button) to shoot RMB (Right Mouse Button) to grab pickups and use your mouse wheel or 1, 2 and 3 to switch between different weapons (machine gun, RPG, laser gun)
